00072   // Allocate the input buffer and pre-size the coordinate vectors.
00073   // n = number of atoms
00074 
00075   void DCD::allocateSpace(const int n) {
00076     xcrds = std::vector<dcd_real>(n);
00077     ycrds = std::vector<dcd_real>(n);
00078     zcrds = std::vector<dcd_real>(n);
00079   }

00083   // Read the F77 record length from the file stream
00084 
00085   unsigned int DCD::readRecordLen(void) {
00086     DataOverlay o;
00087   
00088     ifs()->read(o.c, 4);
00089 
00090     if (ifs()->eof())
00091       throw(end_of_file);
00092     if (ifs()->fail())
00093       throw(record_error);
00094 
00095     uint data = o.ui;
00096     if (swabbing)
00097       data = swab(data);
00098 
00099     return(data);
00100   }

00103   // Check for endian-ness
00104   void DCD::endianMatch(StreamWrapper& fsw) {
00105     unsigned long curpos = fsw()->tellg();
00106     unsigned int datum;
00107     ifs()->read((char *)(&datum), sizeof(datum));
00108     fsw()->seekg(curpos);
00109 
00110     if (ifs()->eof() || ifs()->fail())
00111       throw(GeneralError("Unable to read first datum from DCD file"));
00112 
00113     if (datum != 0x54) {
00114       datum = swab(datum);
00115       if (datum != 0x54)
00116         throw(GeneralError("Unable to determine endian-ness of DCD file"));
00117       swabbing = true;
00118     } else
00119       swabbing = false;
00120   }

00123   // Read a full line of F77-formatted data.
00124   // Returns a pointer to the read data and puts the # of bytes read into *len
00125   // Note:  It is up to the caller to swab individual elements...
00126 
00127   DCD::DataOverlay* DCD::readF77Line(unsigned int *len) {
00128     DataOverlay* ptr;
00129     unsigned int n, n2;
00130 
00131     n = readRecordLen();
00132 
00133     ptr = new DataOverlay[n];
00134 
00135     ifs()->read((char *)ptr, n);
00136     if (ifs()->fail())
00137       throw(line_error);
00138 
00139     n2 = readRecordLen();
00140     if (n != n2)
00141       throw(line_error);
00142 
00143     *len = n;
00144     return(ptr);
00145   }

00149   // Read in the DCD header...
00150 
00151   void DCD::readHeader(void) {
00152     DataOverlay *ptr;
00153     unsigned int len;
00154     char *cp;
00155     int i;
00156 
00157     endianMatch(ifs);
00158     ptr = readF77Line(&len);
00159     if (len != 84)
00160       throw(header_error);
00161 
00162     // Check for the magic name.  Ignore swabbing for now...
00163     DataOverlay o = ptr[0];
00164     if (!(o.c[0] == 'C' && o.c[1] == 'O' && o.c[2] == 'R' && o.c[3] == 'D'))
00165       throw(header_error);
00166 
00167     // Copy in the ICNTRL data...
00168     for (i=0; i<20; i++) {
00169       if (swabbing)
00170         _icntrl[i] = swab(ptr[i+1].i);
00171       else
00172         _icntrl[i] = ptr[i+1].i;
00173     }
00174       
00175     // Extract the delta value...
00176     if (swabbing)
00177       _delta = swab(ptr[10].f);
00178     else
00179       _delta = ptr[10].f;
00180 
00181     if (nfixed() != 0)
00182       throw(GeneralError("Fixed atoms not yet supported"));
00183 
00184     delete[] ptr;
00185 
00186     // Now read in the TITLE info...
00187 
00188     ptr = readF77Line(&len);
00189     char sbuff[81];
00190     int ntitle = ptr[0].i;
00191     if (swabbing)
00192       ntitle = swab(ntitle);
00193 
00194     cp = (char *)(ptr + 1);
00195 
00196     for (i=0; i<ntitle; i++) {
00197       memcpy(sbuff, cp + 80*i, 80);
00198       sbuff[80] = '\0';
00199       std::string s(sbuff);
00200       _titles.push_back(s);
00201     }
00202     delete[] ptr;
00203 
00204     // get the NATOMS...
00205     ptr = readF77Line(&len);
00206     if (len != 4)
00207       throw(header_error);
00208     if (swabbing)
00209       _natoms = swab(ptr->i);
00210     else
00211       _natoms = ptr->i;
00212     delete[] ptr;
00213 
00214 
00215     // Finally, set internal variables and allocate space for a frame...
00216     first_frame_pos = ifs()->tellg();
00217 
00218     frame_size = 12 * (2 + _natoms);
00219     if (hasCrystalParams())
00220       frame_size += 56;
00221 
00222     allocateSpace(_natoms);
00223   }

00226 #if defined(LOOS_LEGACY)
00227 
00228   void DCD::readHeader(std::fstream& fs) {
00229     ifs.setStream(fs);
00230     readHeader();
00231   }
00232 #endif

00236   // Read in and reorder the crystal parameters...
00237   // NOTE: This is already double!
00238 
00239 
00240   void DCD::readCrystalParams(void) {
00241     unsigned int len;
00242     DataOverlay* o;
00243 
00244     o = readF77Line(&len);
00245 
00246     if (len != 48)
00247       throw(GeneralError("Error while reading crystal parameters"));
00248     double *dp = (double *)o;  // The values are actually doubles, so we
00249     // have to use a little trickery... 
00250 
00251     qcrys[0] = dp[0];
00252     qcrys[1] = dp[2];
00253     qcrys[2] = dp[5];
00254     qcrys[3] = dp[1];
00255     qcrys[4] = dp[3];
00256     qcrys[5] = dp[4];
00257     
00258     if (swabbing)
00259       for (int i=0; i<6; ++i)
00260         qcrys[i] = swab(qcrys[i]);
00261 
00262     delete[] o;
00263   }

00267   // Read a line of coordinates into the specified vector.
00268 
00269   void DCD::readCoordLine(std::vector<dcd_real>& v) {
00270     DataOverlay *op;
00271     int n = _natoms * sizeof(dcd_real);
00272     unsigned int len;
00273 
00274 
00275     op = readF77Line(&len);
00276 
00277     if (len != (unsigned int)n)
00278       throw(GeneralError("Error while reading coordinates"));
00279 
00280     // Recast the values as floats and store them...
00281     int i;
00282     for (i=0; i<_natoms; i++)
00283       if (swabbing)
00284         v[i] = swab(op[i].f);
00285       else
00286         v[i] = op[i].f;
00287 
00288     delete[] op;
00289 
00290   }

00292 
00293   void DCD::seekFrameImpl(const uint i) {
00294   
00295     if (first_frame_pos == 0)
00296       throw(GeneralError("Trying to seek to a DCD frame without having first read the header"));
00297 
00298     if (i >= nsteps())
00299       throw(GeneralError("Requested DCD frame is out of range"));
00300 
00301     ifs()->clear();
00302     ifs()->seekg(first_frame_pos + i * frame_size);
00303     if (ifs()->fail() || ifs()->bad()) {
00304       std::ostringstream s;
00305       s << "Cannot seek to frame " << i;
00306       throw(GeneralError(s.str().c_str()));
00307     }
00308   }
00309 
00310 
00311   // Read in a frame of data.
00312   // Returns TRUE if success or FALSE if at EOF.
00313   // Throws an exception if there was an error...  (Should we throw EOF
00314   // instead?) 
00315 
00316   bool DCD::parseFrame(void) {
00317 
00318     if (first_frame_pos == 0)
00319       throw(GeneralError("Trying to read a DCD frame without first having read the header."));
00320 
00321     if (ifs()->eof())
00322       return(false);
00323 
00324     try {
00325       if (hasCrystalParams())
00326         readCrystalParams();
00327     }
00328     catch (EndOfFile& e) { return(false); }
00329     catch (...) { throw; }
00330 
00331     // Only check for EOF for the first line (in case we didn't try to
00332     // read crystal params first...
00333     try { readCoordLine(xcrds); }
00334     catch (EndOfFile& e) { return(false); }
00335     catch (...) { throw; }
00336 
00337     readCoordLine(ycrds);
00338     readCoordLine(zcrds);
00339   
00340     return(true);
00341   }
00342 
00343 
00344   void DCD::rewindImpl(void) {
00345     ifs()->clear();
00346     ifs()->seekg(first_frame_pos);
00347     if (ifs()->fail() || ifs()->bad())
00348       throw(GeneralError("Error rewinding file"));
00349   }

00354 
00355   std::vector<GCoord> DCD::coords(void) {
00356     std::vector<GCoord> crds(_natoms);
00357     int i;
00358 
00359     for (i=0; i<_natoms; i++) {
00360       crds[i].x(xcrds[i]);
00361       crds[i].y(ycrds[i]);
00362       crds[i].z(zcrds[i]);
00363     }
00364 
00365     return(crds);
00366   }
00367 
00368   std::vector<GCoord> DCD::mappedCoords(const std::vector<int>& indices) {
00369     std::vector<int>::const_iterator iter;
00370     std::vector<GCoord> crds(indices.size());
00371 
00372     int j = 0;
00373     for (iter = indices.begin(); iter != indices.end(); iter++, j++) {
00374       int index = *iter;
00375       crds[j].x(xcrds[index]);
00376       crds[j].y(ycrds[index]);
00377       crds[j].z(zcrds[index]);
00378     }
00379 
00380     return(crds);
00381   }
00382 
00383 
00384   void DCD::updateGroupCoords(AtomicGroup& g) {
00385     for (AtomicGroup::iterator i = g.begin(); i != g.end(); ++i) {
00386       int idx = (*i)->id()-1;
00387       if (idx < 0 || idx >= _natoms)
00388         throw(LOOSError(**i, "Atom index into the trajectory frame is out of bounds"));
00389       (*i)->coords(GCoord(xcrds[idx], ycrds[idx], zcrds[idx]));
00390     }
00391 
00392     // Handle periodic boundary conditions (if present)
00393     if (hasPeriodicBox()) {
00394       g.periodicBox(periodicBox());
00395     }
00396   }
